name: Zone Out
description:
Just another day at the office!

Project completed as part of the UCSC Game Design master's program. We were assigned an emotion, and our task was to create a game that conveyed that emotion. Can you guess what our emotion was?

Programming and sound design by pat. Sprites and level design by aabicus. Special thanks to MJ, Erin, and our playtesters at UCSC Silicon Valley!
